title: [Large-scale] Flipped Learning-Based English Speaking Anxiety Reduction Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic English communication skills
context.additional_context: Targeting mathematics field managers/leaders, aiming to reduce English-speaking anxiety required in work environments

learning_goals: Learners reduce their English speaking anxiety index (based on AESPQ) by 30% or more through 12 weeks of flipped learning
Learners complete pre-learning videos (15 minutes) and quizzes (10 items) twice weekly with 80% or higher completion rates
Learners participate in peer feedback at least three times weekly during live video sessions
Learners submit weekly 1:1 voice recording assignments achieving 70% or higher accuracy in pronunciation/intonation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
